flawed_nl_solution:
His brother has 15 rubber bands - 6 rubber bands = <<15-6=14>>14 rubber bands.
They have 15 rubber bands + 14 rubber bands = <<15+14=29>>29 rubber bands together.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
